parameters.name: Note
parameters.description: INote to detach from this magnetic line

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: IMathPoint where to move the note specified by Note

title: IMagneticLine.RemoveNote
description: Detaches the specified note from this magnetic line and moves it to the specified location.
signature:
System.Boolean RemoveNote( 
   Note
Note
,
   MathPoint
Location
)

parameters.name: Note
parameters.description: INote to detach from this magnetic line

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: IMathPoint where to move the note specified by Note

returns: True if successful, false if not
